title: Effect of merger or acquisition on prior business,
context: ยง412:2-509 Effect of merger or acquisition on prior business, title and obligations. Sections 412:3-610 and 412:3-615 shall apply to the businesses previously carried on by any failing financial institution, title to its property, and its liabilities with respect to any merger or acquisition consummated under this part. [L 1993, c 350, pt of ยง1]
